text.content: from autonomous vehicle (AV) to urban aerial mobility (UAM), have an increasing capacity to autonomously navigate complex environments, adapt to dynamic conditions, and interact seamlessly with human users. This progression is driven by parallel advancements in actuator and sensor technologies, control, and artificial intelligence, propelling us toward a landscape where mobility is not just about transportation but about intelligent and personalized movement solutions. Our research aims to close key gaps in this domain by improving control system, enhancing simulation accuracy, and advancing human-machine interaction. Addressing these areas, I seek to fully realize the potential of future mobility, focusing on safety, efficiency, and societal alignment.

rich_text.plain_text: from autonomous vehicle (AV) to urban aerial mobility (UAM), have an increasing capacity to autonomously navigate complex environments, adapt to dynamic conditions, and interact seamlessly with human users. This progression is driven by parallel advancements in actuator and sensor technologies, control, and artificial intelligence, propelling us toward a landscape where mobility is not just about transportation but about intelligent and personalized movement solutions. Our research aims to close key gaps in this domain by improving control system, enhancing simulation accuracy, and advancing human-machine interaction. Addressing these areas, I seek to fully realize the potential of future mobility, focusing on safety, efficiency, and societal alignment.

text.content: Research philosophy and Challenges in Future Mobility

rich_text.plain_text: Research philosophy and Challenges in Future Mobility

text.content: Our research aims to address three gaps in future mobility

rich_text.plain_text: Our research aims to address three gaps in future mobility

text.content: The first gap is the control error between control commands and outputs

rich_text.plain_text: The first gap is the control error between control commands and outputs

text.content: in autonomous systems, due to model mismatches and sensor errors. Our goal is to

text.content: that mitigate these issues, ensuring safe, efficient vehicle maneuverability.

rich_text.plain_text: that mitigate these issues, ensuring safe, efficient vehicle maneuverability.

text.content: is another key to improving responsiveness and reliability under diverse conditions. Through algorithmic and hardware innovations, I aim to refine systems for precise execution of commands, advancing future mobility solutions.

rich_text.plain_text: is another key to improving responsiveness and reliability under diverse conditions. Through algorithmic and hardware innovations, I aim to refine systems for precise execution of commands, advancing future mobility solutions.

text.content: The second gap is the discrepancy between the real world and the simulation.

rich_text.plain_text: The second gap is the discrepancy between the real world and the simulation.

text.content: elevating the precision of simulation models

rich_text.plain_text: elevating the precision of simulation models

text.content: , so they accurately reflect real-world conditions, enhancing the validation and optimization of autonomous systems. A critical challenge lies in creating adaptive digital twins to simulate complex phenomena in real-time, like in-ground effects on the UAM or ground vehicle dynamics on varied road surfaces. This effort extends to updating models with environmental changes, like traffic and pedestrian patterns, for accurate system testing. To increase the fidelity of these digital twins requires

rich_text.plain_text: , so they accurately reflect real-world conditions, enhancing the validation and optimization of autonomous systems. A critical challenge lies in creating adaptive digital twins to simulate complex phenomena in real-time, like in-ground effects on the UAM or ground vehicle dynamics on varied road surfaces. This effort extends to updating models with environmental changes, like traffic and pedestrian patterns, for accurate system testing. To increase the fidelity of these digital twins requires

text.content: integration of real-time data and machine learning algorithms, as well as sophisticated modeling and system identification

rich_text.plain_text: integration of real-time data and machine learning algorithms, as well as sophisticated modeling and system identification

text.content: . Such improvements make simulations more adaptable and predictive, bridging the gap between virtual and actual scenarios. These advances can significantly accelerate the development cycle of autonomous systems.

rich_text.plain_text: . Such improvements make simulations more adaptable and predictive, bridging the gap between virtual and actual scenarios. These advances can significantly accelerate the development cycle of autonomous systems.

text.content: The third gap is the empathy gap between humans and machines

rich_text.plain_text: The third gap is the empathy gap between humans and machines

text.content: , reflecting the challenge of enabling machines to feel and respond to human emotions, pains, and intentions. Our objective is to bridge the empathy gap by developing systems equipped with advanced perception capabilities and emotional intelligence algorithms. These systems should

rich_text.plain_text: , reflecting the challenge of enabling machines to feel and respond to human emotions, pains, and intentions. Our objective is to bridge the empathy gap by developing systems equipped with advanced perception capabilities and emotional intelligence algorithms. These systems should

text.content: interpret ambiguous human cues from both machine-centric sensing (such as velocity, vibration, etc.) and human-centric sensing (including facial expressions, vocal nuances, etc.)

rich_text.plain_text: interpret ambiguous human cues from both machine-centric sensing (such as velocity, vibration, etc.) and human-centric sensing (including facial expressions, vocal nuances, etc.)

text.content: , enabling machines to adjust their behavior in real-time to align with human comfort and preferences. Examples include urban aerial mobility solutions that detect passenger motion sickness and autonomous vehicles that recognize and avoid potential hazards. Ultimately, personalizing human-machine interactions is key to bridging the empathy gap, to offer mobility experiences customized to individual needs, creating machines that can truly empathize with users.
